entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nipawin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:16 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -35.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nipawin Airport 7:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -35.8°C
Pressure: 104.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -39.8°C
Wind: E 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
